item.title: How many coin in your piggy bank with micro-python & 3D-Printer
item.description:
Description

I need share my experience esp82266 with micro-python and 3D-Printer. Start with small problem. "How many coin in your piggy bank" I resolve problem and make a new question: "how to real time update how many coin in your piggy bank". This project can apply to many project. So I am share code in github https://github.com/montri2025/esp8266-micropython-beginner, https://github.com/montri2025/esp8266-relay-wemos and I fixed small bug I found on Marlin 3D-Printer firmware and make video help every-one under stand 3D-Printer Technology. And I have youtube channel for share how to, review, teach 3D-Printer, drone, micro controller, Etc https://www.youtube.com/user/deenajacom

I am a maker. I love IOT, 3D-Printer and Micro-python technology make my life happy. I need share my experience esp82266 with micro-python it easy. Every one can do by self. So I am share code in github https://github.com/montri2025/esp8266-micropython-beginner, https://github.com/montri2025/esp8266-relay-wemos and I help fixed small bug on https://github.com/MarlinFirmware/Marlin and https://github.com/montri2025/marlin1.6-micromake-C1 just have one fork and make video help every-one understand 3D-Printer Technology. And I have youtube channel for share how to, review, teach 3D-Printer, drone, micro controller, Etc: https://www.youtube.com/user/deenajacom
item.dc:creator: Montri Sroymukda
